sen.j: 木津温泉（きつおんせん）は、京都府京丹後市網野町木津（旧国丹後国）にある温泉。
sen.e: Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring is the spa that is situated at Kitsu, Amino-cho, Kyotango City, Kyoto Prefecture, and the place around here was once called "Tango Province."
Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring is a spa situated at Kitsu, Amino-cho, Kyotango City, Kyoto Prefecture. The area was once called "Tango Province."
Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring is a spa situated at Kitsu, Amino-cho, Kyotango City, Kyoto Prefecture; the area was once called "Tango Province."

sen.j: 温泉名はきつであり、濁らない。
sen.e: The spa name reads "Kitsu," not "Kizu."
The spa name reads "Kitsu," not "Kizu."
The spa name reads "Kitsu," not "Kizu."

sen.j: 北近畿タンゴ鉄道宮津線木津温泉駅下車、徒歩1分
sen.e: Please get off at Kitsu-onsen Station on Miyazu Line which is operated by Kitakinki Tango Railway Corporation and walk for one minute from the station, and you will come to Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring.
It is a one minute walk from Kitsu-onsen Station on Miyazu Line which is operated by Kitakinki Tango Railway Corporation.
It is a one minute walk from Kitsu-onsen Station on Miyazu Line which is operated by Kitakinki Tango Railway Corporation.

sen.j: 2007年4月1日、駅ホームに足湯「しらさぎの湯」が完成した。
sen.e: On April 1, 2007, "Shirasagi no yu Hot Spring" (a footbath facility) was completed on the platform of the station.
On April 1, 2007, "Shirasagi no yu Hot Spring" (a footbath facility) was completed on the platform of the station.
On April 1, 2007, 'Shirasagi no yu Hot Spring' (a footbath facility) was completed on the platform of the station.

sen.j: 原泉掛け流しで、午前9時～午後5時まで利用できる。
sen.e: The hot water from the source of the hot spring flows in the footbath facility, and this is available from 9 a.m to 5 p.m.
Hot water sourced from the hot spring flows in the footbath facility, and is available from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.
Hot water sourced from the hot spring flows in the footbath facility, and is available from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.

sen.j: 利用は無料だが、鉄道利用者以外の利用には駅の入場券が必要になる。
sen.e: You can enjoy the footbath for free, but if you are not a passenger of the train, you need to buy the platform ticket.
The footbath is free, but those who are not passengers must purchase a platform ticket.
The footbath is free, but those who are not passengers must purchase a platform ticket.

sen.j: 京都縦貫自動車道宮津天橋立インターチェンジから国道178号、国道312号、府道17号、国道178号で木津温泉まで約37Km
sen.e: To come to Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring by a car from the direction of Osaka or Kyoto, please get off the Kyoto Longitudinal Expressway at Miyazu Amanohashidate Interchange, and then drive about 37 km (first, on the National Road No. 178, and second, on the National Road No. 312, and third, on the Kyoto Prefectural Road No. 17, and finally, on the National Road No. 178).

Coming from Osaka or Kyoto by car, the Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring can be reached by getting off the Kyoto Longitudinal Expressway at Miyazu Amanohashidate Interchange, and then driving about 37 km (first, on the National Road No. 178, and second, on the National Road No. 312, and third, on the Kyoto Prefectural Road No. 17, and finally, on the National Road No. 178).

The Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring can be reached by getting off the Kyoto Longitudinal Expressway at Miyazu Amanohashidate Interchange, and then driving about thirty-seven kilometers (first, on the National Route 178, and second, on the National Route 312, and third, on the Kyoto Prefectural Route 17, and finally, on the National Route 178).

tit.e: Chemical makeup of the hot spring
Chemical makeup of the hot spring
tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.e: Alkaline simple hot spring
Alkaline simple hot spring
Alkaline simple hot spring

sen.j: 源泉 湧出温度42℃ 毎分1400リットル
sen.e: The source of the hot spring - The temperature is 42℃ and the flow rate is 1400 liters per minute.
The source of the hot spring - The temperature is 42℃ and the flow rate is 1400 liters per minute.
The source of the hot spring - The temperature is 42 degrees Celsius and the flow rate is 1400 liters per minute.

sen.j: 効能 神経痛・筋肉痛・関節痛・皮膚病 外傷性疾患・リウマチ・婦人病・胃腸病など
sen.e: The effect - The hot spring is good for neuralgia, muscular pain, arthritis, dermatosis, traumatopathy, rheumatism, a women's disease, gastroenteropathy, et cetera.
The effect - The hot spring is good for neuralgia, muscular pain, arthritis, dermatosis, traumatopathy, rheumatism, a women's disease, gastroenteropathy, et cetera.
The effect - The hot spring is good for neuralgia, muscular pain, arthritis, dermatosis, traumatopathy, rheumatism, a women's disease, gastroenteropathy, et cetera.

sen.j: ※効能はその効果を万人に保証するものではない。
sen.e: *The effect of the hot spring is not always guaranteed for everyone.
*Effects of the hot spring are not guaranteed.
*Effects of the hot spring are not guaranteed.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 駅と国道178号線の間に数軒の旅館、民宿がある程度でいわゆる温泉街ではなく、丹後地方の閑静な情緒がある。
sen.e: Having only several "ryokan" (Japanese-style hotels) and tourist homes between Kitsu-onsen Station and the National Road No. 178, Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring is a little too small in size to be called a hot-spring resort, but it has a calm atmosphere that is characteristic of Tango region.

Having only several "ryokan" (Japanese-style hotels) and tourist homes between Kitsu-onsen Station and the National Road No. 178, Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring is too small in size to be called a hot-spring resort, but has a calm atmosphere that is characteristic of Tango region.

Having only several "ryokan" (Japanese-style hotels) and tourist homes between Kitsu-onsen Station and the National Route 178, Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring is too small in size to be called a hot-spring resort, but has a calm atmosphere that is characteristic of Tango region.

sen.j: ここを訪れる観光客は温泉と共に、冬場のカニ料理を楽しみに訪れる者も多い。
sen.e: Many tourists visit here not only for the hot spring but for crab dishes during the wintertime.
Many tourists visit here not only for the hot spring but for crab dishes during the wintertime.
Many tourists visit here not only for the hot spring but for crab dishes during the wintertime.

sen.j: 木津温泉は京都府内でももっとも古い温泉で、別名「しらさぎ温泉」とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring is the oldest spa in Kyoto Prefecture, and it is also called "Shirasagi Onsen Hot Spring."
Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring is the oldest spa in Kyoto Prefecture, and is also called "Shirasagi Onsen Hot Spring."
Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring is the oldest spa in Kyoto Prefecture, and is also called 'Shirasagi Onsen Hot Spring.'

sen.j: 奈良時代の僧侶行基が、白鷺が傷を癒しているのを見て発見したという伝承も残っている。
sen.e: There is a folklore that Gyoki, the Buddhist priest in Nara Period, found out the hot spring when he watched a white heron heal its injury with the spring water.
An old tale from the area says that Gyoki, the Buddhist priest in Nara Period, found the hot spring when he saw a white heron use the spring water to heal its injury.
An old tale from the area says that Gyoki, the Buddhist priest in the Nara period, found the hot spring when he saw a white heron use the spring water to heal its injury.
sen.cmt: period 小文字にしました。"the" を挿入しました。

sen.j: 今から１２５０年ほど昔、天平の飢饉が起こり、この丹後木津でも少なからずその影響を受け、疫病が発生した。
sen.e: About 1250 years ago, Tenpyo Famine broke out, and it had a significant impact on people living here in Tango Kitsu because it caused a plague.
About 1250 years ago, the Tenpyo Famine broke out, with the resulting plague leaving a significant impact on people living in Tango Kitsu.
About 1250 years ago, the Tenpyo Famine broke out, with the resulting plague leaving a significant impact on people living in Tango Kitsu.

sen.j: そのとき、この地を訪れていたのが行基であった。
sen.e: And it was Gyoki who visited here just at that time.
And it was Gyoki who visited here during these events.
And it was Gyoki who visited here during these events.

sen.j: 行基は法力をふるうとともに、人々に温泉につかるよう説いてまわったそうである。
sen.e: Gyoki is said to have exerted the power of the Buddhist dharma and also have advised people to soak in the hot spring.
Gyoki is said to have exerted the power of the Buddhist dharma and to have advised people to soak in the hot spring.
Gyoki is said to have exerted the power of the Buddhist dharma and to have advised people to soak in the hot spring.

sen.j: そのおかげで、この木津の地は疫病の難から救われたといい伝えられており、その疫病とは皮膚病の一種だったようで、それ以来木津温泉は、皮膚病の効能を第一にうたっている。
sen.e: Thanks to his advice, people here in Kitsu are said to have had a narrow escape from the plague that seems to have been a kind of a dermatosis, so ever since, Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring has publicized itself as being good for a dermatosis among others.

Thanks to his advice, people here in Kitsu are said to have narrowly escaped the plague which seemed to have been a kind of a dermatosis. Ever since, Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring has publicized itself as being good for dermatosis among other ailments.

Thanks to his advice, people here in Kitsu are said to have narrowly escaped the plague which seemed to have been a kind of a dermatosis; ever since, Kitsu-onsen Hot Spring has publicized itself as being good for dermatosis among other ailments.
